issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Improve instructions for running tpch benchmark
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9784](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9784). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
While trying to ru the TPCH benchmark introduced in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7946/files, I found that the referenced `tpch-dbgen` program did not produce files in the way that the benchmark wanted. 

It would be good to update the code/instructions to be reproducable

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9784?focusedCommentId=17180813) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7989
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7989>
